event.title: CommitCon: Git and Open Source
event.description:
> Have you ever wondered, how thousands of developers work and manage a large codebase?    

That's why, IET NITK plans to hold global KEP for Git and Open Source, chaired by Rajan Jaiswal (GSoC 2021 with CCExtractor), Aashish Janaswamy, and Aakash Chandra. The event would span for three days, and we would hold a 1.5 hours Youtube Live every day from 6th to 9th June. 

It is designed to provide a complete knowledge of the version control system and its importance in the development life cycle, how it can be efficiently used to manage large codebases

![CommitCon Theme Poster](https://res.cloudinary.com/iet-nitk/image/upload/v1622881943/Whats_App_Image_2021_06_05_at_11_45_45_AM_8be6d4de3f.jpg)

---- 
#### Installation Guide
-   Linux: [https://git-scm.com/download/linux](https://git-scm.com/download/linux)
-   Mac: [https://git-scm.com/download/mac](https://git-scm.com/download/mac)
-  Windows: [https://git-scm.com/download/win](https://git-scm.com/download/win)

#### Event Record
##### Session 1
- By Rajan Jaiswal, **6'th June, 6:00 PM on Youtube Live**
- Gist: A basic overview on version control systems and Git
- Link: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9OTXEmF4Ug8](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9OTXEmF4Ug8)
- Presentation slides: [https://bit.ly/3cp2xzY](https://bit.ly/3cp2xzY)

##### Session 2
- By Aashish Janaswamy, **7'th June, 6:00 PM on Youtube Live**
- A medium-level dive into Git and Git commands. We'll cover the most commonly used Git commands here, as well as an introduction to GitHub.
- Please have a Github account created before the session begins.
- Link: [https://youtu.be/mhRWxjUE6EE](https://youtu.be/mhRWxjUE6EE)

##### Session 3
- Anyone can learn Git easily, but as developers, you need to be better than most. This session will focus on advanced Git concepts

##### Session 4

- Quite simple. We'll be having our sessions on Youtube Live at our [official Youtube channel](https://www.youtube.com/c/IETNITK). The resources and repositories will also be shared here. So stay tuned on this page as well.

#### Important Links
- Youtube Page: [https://www.youtube.com/c/IETNITK](https://www.youtube.com/c/IETNITK)
- GitHub Organization Repository: [https://github.com/IET-NITK](https://github.com/IET-NITK)
